tldr: Affected versions of this package do not properly sanitize the contents of HTML `<template>` tags, allowing malicious markup inside `template.content` to bypass sanitization. An attacker could craft a payload where dangerous elements or attributes are embedded within a template fragment and later instantiated into the DOM, leading to DOM-based XSS or script execution when the template is rendered or cloned.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `HtmlSanitizer` library to the patch version.
